Sentencas: The objective of this work is to obtain thin films of perovskites for use as a cathode of SOFCs (Solid Oxide Fuel Cell) by suspension plasma spraying.
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying

Sentencas: This process consists in mechanically injecting a well dispersed stable suspension of micrometric particles in a direct current (dc) plasma jet.
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying

Sentencas: In the process, large suspension droplets (similar to300 mum) are divided into tiny ones (a few mum) by the plasma jet flow.
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying

Sentencas: Then the solvent is evaporated and the particles melt resulting in perovskite droplets of about 1 mum impacting on a substrate.
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying

Sentencas: Two types of suspensions were prepared.
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying

Sentencas: The first one contains an attrition-milled mixture of La2O3 and MnO2 powders (d(50) =
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying

Sentencas: 1 mum) and the second one an attrition-milled LaMnO3 perovskite powder (d(50) = 0.8 mum).
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying

Sentencas: The La2O3/MnO2 suspension has been injected with an arc current of 400 A and with a plasma forming gas Ar/H-2.
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying

Sentencas: In this case, a strong MnO2 evaporation takes place which hinders the perosvskite forming reaction in the plasma jet.
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying

Sentencas: The LaMnO3 perovskite suspension has been injected with an arc current of 300 A and three different plasma forming gases: Ar, Ar/H-2 and Ar/H-2/He.
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying

Sentencas: Satisfactory coatings of perovskite can be obtained with Ar.
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying

Sentencas: Other plasma forming gases result in perovskite decomposition.
Titulo: Preparation of stable suspensions of perovskites for plasma spraying
